values:
Merry christmas everyone...i hope everyone gets what they want! i have to go to some dumb christmas party tonight..i miss all my friends at school...even though i hate lynnhaven...sydneys over..like usual..i dont like how 2 of my best friends are in a fight though...they no who they are...but since its christmas, i wanted to thank everyone who has been my true friend and helped me through the year so far...they should no who they are...i love you guys<3 but anyways...tell me what you want for christams...or just comment because yu love meeee<3

i love everyone...*dont label me*<<dont feel stupid if you dont know waht that means..

 

<3allie

..I like hate school...im sick of drama...i wanna go to a different school...everyone says they hate drama...and then turn around and cause it??wtf people? Everyone at school fucked up Lynnhaven for each other...its everyones fault...everyone talks shit..even if they say they dont..i hate it..i cant stand it...i cant even tell if i have real friends.yeah they tell me they love me and im their best friend...but am i?? There are people who care about me and they know who they are but i mean come on. I see soo many LJ's that say they want the drama to go, well maybe if everyone stopped being 2 faced and shit then maybe it would stop and id have a reason to go to school every day. right now...im scared to go to sleep every night because im scared of what will happen the next day. This shouldnt happen. im confused about stuff. and i almost cant even stand it anymore. People who say shit, i dont even know if it comes back even harder on them, likes its supposed to...it doesnt seem like it bc it looks like everyone enjoys talking shit and alot of it...what is going on...give it a break for once...have fun...have real friends you can trust...if you stop...then maybe other ppl will too...im not saying that i dont talk shit because sometimes i do...but i mean what am i supposed to do..sit there and let people tell me shit that isnt true...for this whole thing to end everyone has to stop...and wow....rumors...electric toothbrush...not about me but about one of my good friends...wtf who would sit there and use a toothbrush...that is dicusting...and someone must fuckin have alot of time on their hands to come up with that shit..thats gross...i hope people know that that isnt true bc i no melissa anderson and she would never do anyhting like that. FUCK EVERYONE WHO CAUSES DRAMA AND MAKES LYNNHAVEN THE FUCKIN GAYEST PLACE ON EARTH..I HATE IT THERE..

wow i feel alot better, but am still hurting inside...<//33 allie

Uhh..i feel like my life is going to pieces..its probably my fault, i just dont no it. I try to live life at the fullest, but somebody always has to crush that. I wish everyone could cut this drama shit and have fun. So, would you rather go spred rumors about someone and make them feel bad, or go have fun...and no i dont mean fun as in go tell lies about someone and make people laugh at that certain person..i mean the kinda fun where you go run outside because you want to. go down to the beach just to put your feet in the sand. go somewhere youve never been just to find out whats there...that kind of fun...so...can you handle it???? i dont know about you guys but im ready to try it. Leave me some comments...tell me what you think or hit up my cell 6197373<3

</33?? Allie

I went to the game tonight..Guys sucked...like always...Ladies worked the gulls...haha like always..im on the phone with someone..not gunna say the name...itll probly start more **drama**....but n e ways...the cheerleaders were better than the other team. Probly going to the movies this week..tomorows friday...finally....2 days of NO drama...have you ever got broken up with and then hated the person you were dating and then one day you looked at them and everything you did flashed back and you wanted the person back???if you can relate comment...or just comment to be nice :) call to chill this week <36197373

I LOVE ****.....

<3allie

Hey ...im havent updated in forever....im on the phone with seph right now. hes boring to talk to...i was hanging out with jake and david yesterday..i ahd fun...i have to go to cheerleading practice like everyday..it sucks...omg..the dance was great...but none of my girls went!!molly shannon jessica grace kristen y. alexis hannah mary melissa kristina sarah and if i left you out im sorry!! ha addie...if you read this it was sooo much fun gettin low with you..hahha...i danced alot and had alot of fun..im hoping to see my girls that didnt go this time go to the next dance!! MOLLY+MARKO SHANNON+AUSTIN GRACE+RYAN KRISTEN+DAN MARY+KYLE <<i love you so much and you will hopefully all stay together and no fights!!leave me some comments<33

<33 allie

I hope everyone had a great thanksgiving!!! i had a good one. i hung out with austin all day. i miss all of my friendss...uhhh i cant wait to go back to school.im glad im getting good comments so far :). im hangin out with my little cousin....shes 2... i have nothing else to do anyways...my day wasnt really interesting at all. sorry if this is soo short..my day was short????call me to chill anybody..calllll me!!! 619 7373...i love you...if you love me???

 <3allie

im soo tired...cant go to sleeeeeep...its not like im goin to school tomorrow anyways :( .....i miss my babies...all of them...i hope they miss me too....IM EXPECTING BALLOONS WHEN I COME BACK TO SCHOOL ...ha just playin...ill just be glad to see my friends....i took sleep medicine...but it didnt work...im a tough kid wat can i say..haha not really...but that pill stuff isnt working...i cant wait till thanksgiving!!my uncles coming to see meeee!! my uncles really cool....but n e ways..im gunna watch tv..not right now...but when i get done with this...hmmm...i had a really rushed day today...uh not...i have to sit on the couch all day and do nothing ...just rest...yeah it was great at first bc i was just like yay no school....but now its no fun....i want to see my friends :( ive been spending alot of my time on this site.. www.funnyjunk.com its funny....but im kinda over it now...i want to go tanning....i havent been in a while..and plus ive only gone like 4 times in my life...sooo...im out because its like 1:00 and im tired as a bit.....leave some coments or 3 questions<33 <33ALLIE<33 IM STILL SICK UGHHHHH

im still sick....ha nobody really nos about my journal still...its ok...haha u no whats funny...when i go back to school, everyone will be like oh she got mono from kissing but my doctor even told me i didnt get it from kissing...she new that because i had to have blood taken from my arm and stuff like that...it didnt hurt at all.... you cant get only get mono from kissing...there are alot more ways...leave me three questions...and comfort...im still sick...:(...
just created this..no one know about it....dont think i want them too.....dont want stupid shit about myself written all in it
